meanings.definition: A person or thing that reacts excessively or extremely to a stimulus.
meanings.sent1: Some people are hyperreactors and get very scared easily.
meanings.sent2: The hyperreactors in the group always jump at sudden noises.
meanings.sent3: The hyperreactors at the haunted house made everyone laugh with their exaggerated reactions.
meanings.sent4: Her cat was a hyperreactor to any new toy, pouncing on it immediately.
meanings.sent5: The hyperreactors in the horror movie screamed louder than anyone else.

meanings.sent1: The hyperreactors gathered for a meeting to discuss safety measures.
meanings.sent2: In the lab, the hyperreactors were carefully monitored for any unusual responses.
meanings.sent3: The hyperreactors in the factory formed a club to share their experiences.
meanings.sent4: The hyperreactors in the experiment showed a wide range of reactions to the same stimulus.
meanings.sent5: The hyperreactors in the study group were known for their quick responses to questions.
